message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $180. I believe it's a great deal and will be very valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. I'm willing to meet you halfway from the original price, but I'm not willing to go above that.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but the product's value is quite a bit higher than that for me. How about we settle at $160?
I understand that the product has value, but I'm still not willing to go above $130. I'm willing to meet you halfway from your latest offer, but I think that's the maximum I can go.
